WorkItem.Description: Develop appropriate UI controls for processing data using KerbalData helper functions like Refill(). The UI should expose every helper function available to the user in a context appropriate manner.
WorkItem.Summary: Build UI features for access to API functions

Comments.Message:
Creating right-click menu on tree to access the following features:

* Save
* Revert [PLACEHOLDER]
* ClearDebris
* FillResources
* ChangeOrbit

Menu items will appear in a context-correct manner (IE FillResources is only available on nodes that contain resources)
